description: Translate only rows where subtype value is an NFL type

translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, map_sheet_id, orig_stand_id, ogc_fid}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Create cas_id using the unique identifier poly_id added during loading.
Maps source value to SOIL_MOIST_REG using lists of values. Catch zero as a null value.
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100
Every polygon is either LYR, NFL, or DST. So NFL layer is always 1.
Maps source value to NAT_NON_VEG using list of values.
Maps source value to NON_FOR_ANTH using list of values. Catches values 840 as UNKNOWN_VALUE. 840 is listed in the manual as a possible value but no specific land use is assigned.
Maps source value to NON_FOR_VEG using list of values.
